verses.name: James 2:5
verses.text: Hearken, my beloved brethren, Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith, and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him?

verses.name: James 2:6
verses.text: But ye have despised the poor. Do not rich men oppress you, and draw you before the judgment seats?

verses.name: James 2:7
verses.text: Do not they blaspheme that worthy name by the which ye are called?

verses.name: James 2:8
verses.text: If ye fulfil the royal law according to the scripture, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself, ye do well:

verses.name: James 2:9
verses.text: But if ye have respect to persons, ye commit sin, and are convinced of the law as transgressors.
